channel.title: CVE Feed for Robokassa -- Robokassa payment gateway for Woocommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Robokassa -- Robokassa payment gateway for Woocommerce

item.title: CVE-2024-47395|2024-10-07T13:18:44.255Z -- robokassa -- robokassa%20payment%20gateway%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Robokassa Robokassa payment gateway for Woocommerce allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Robokassa payment gateway for Woocommerce: from n/a through 1.6.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-47395|2024-10-05T14:38:32.154Z -- robokassa -- robokassa%20payment%20gateway%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Robokassa Robokassa payment gateway for Woocommerce allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Robokassa payment gateway for Woocommerce: from n/a through 1.6.1.
